articles.description: Steve Carell stars in this new satirical show that has a few good one-liners, but there's not enough funny material for a whole series
articles.content: Space Forceis the latest series to come up against the problem that has bedevilled satirists over the past five years: how do you parody Donald Trump? When the president announced the creation of the… [+3056 chars]
